briefdescription.para: This function is used to initialize WLAN Radios.

parameterdescription.para:
- in: Object: Device.Wifi.Radio.Vendor - all parameters from this object out: List of objects:
Device.Wifi, Param: RadioNumberOfEntries - number of radio interfaces that were created
Device.Wifi.Radio, Param: Name - Name of interface (This object * number of interfaces created)
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to Uninitialize WLAN Radios.

parameterdescription.para: - should be NULL, unused object, placeholder for any future usage.
Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

simplesect.para: FAPI_SUCCESS / FAPI_FAILURE Uninitializes the WLAN radios, removes the WLAN drivers, and cleans the internal SW structures for the WLAN vendor implementations

briefdescription.para: This function is used to query WLAN capability of underlying WLAN Radio.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN radio interface name.
- Object: Device.Wifi.Radio - empty object, out: object will be filled with capabilities as parameters
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set WLAN Radio Info.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN radio interface name.
- List of 1 or 2 objects: Device.Wifi.Radio and/or Device.Wifi.Radio.Vendor
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN Radio Statistics.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN radio interface name.
- Object: Device.Wifi.Radio.Stats.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

simplesect.para: FAPI_SUCCESS / FAPI_FAILURE Pass an object containing object name with no parameters, to get all statistics in the object. Pass an object with name and parameters that should be read if you want a subset of statistics.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to add a WLAN SSID interface, i.e. to create a VAP.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN RADIO interface name, parent of VAP
- in (optional): Device.Wifi.SSID Object containing the VAP interface name and its MAC address, out: the created VAP interface name and its MAC address
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

simplesect.para: FAPI_SUCCESS / FAPI_FAILURE Create a virtual access point (AKA VAP or MBSSID), transmitting on the passed radio interface. For some vendors the radio interface will be the name of the main AP, for others there is a unique name for radio configuration.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to remove a WLAN SSID interface, i.e. to delete a VAP.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN VAP interface name
- should be NULL, unused object, placeholder for any future usage.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set SSID in WLAN SSID Object.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.SSID Object Config for Setting.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN SSID Info, e.g. current configuration.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- WLAN Device.Wifi.SSID Object Info. The Object name and (optionally) parameter names to read are passed as input, values are returned as output.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN SSID Statistics.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.SSID.Stats Object. The Object name is passed as input.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set WLAN AccessPoint Object.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- List of 1 or 2 objects: Device.Wifi.AccessPoint and/or Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.Vendor
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN AccessPoint Info, e.g. current configuration.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint Object Info. The Object name and parameter names to read are passed as input, values are returned as output.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set WLAN Security Object (Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.Security).

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.Security Object Config for Setting.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN Security Info.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.Security Object Info. The Object name and parameter names to read are passed as input, values are returned as output.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to set WLAN WPS Object (Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.WPS).

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.WPS Object Config for Setting.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

xrefdescription.para: Accept a list to include the WPS vendor parameters (which object?)

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get WLAN WPS Info.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.WPS Object Info. The Object name and parameter names to read are passed as input, values are returned as output.
- Flags are placeholder for any future usage.

briefdescription.para: This function is used to get all associated stations information.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP Interface name.
- Device.Wifi.AccessPoint.AssociatedDevice object. Returns list of associated devices and their statistics.
- Flags for any future use.

xrefdescription.para: Do we want to separate to API for getting a list of Associated devices and a different API for statistics?

para.verbatim: Returns list of objects, for each STA return a pair of objects: Device.WiFi.AccessPoint.AssociatedDevice and Device.WiFi.AccessPoint.AssociatedDevice.Stats

briefdescription.para: This function is used to create a config.in file for the FAPI scripts layer and call the appropriate script.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- block of objects required by the script
- L2 script that is executed for the API
- Helper array to hold object index

briefdescription.para: This function is used for parsing the output configuration file that was created by the script layer.

parameterdescription.para: - block of objects required by the script
- Helper array to hold object index

briefdescription.para: ltq_mtk_sh_helper is the main function of this module, mostly responsible to intermediate between the FAPI wlan layer and the scripts layer.

parameterdescription.para: - WLAN AP/VAP interface name
- block of objects required by the script
- L2 script that is executed for the API

briefdescription.para: Helper function that removes the index suffix from the string and returns it as integer.

parameterdescription.para: - string with index suffix

simplesect.para: for legal value returned the index number, for ERROR cases returned -1

briefdescription.para: convert_str_to_hex helper function that converts string to ASCII hex string.

parameterdescription.para: a pointer to temp string that used for returning the output of the function.
the source string that should be converted to ASCII hex value

briefdescription.para: remove_new_line remove new line from string.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to string

briefdescription.para: It provides a set of MTK speciffic API for WLAN configuration.
